item.title: Creating a Generator
item.description: Building a Generator from scratch Im sorry there is no step by step guide (Yet) you can use the following as reference until I get around to writing it: Applied Metaprogramming with Myriad and Falanx - This is a video I made for my YouTube channel which covers some details on Myriad. Myriad Intro - This is a blog post I wrote around the time of Applied Metaprogramming with Myriad and Falanx which has details of making a generator that produces this simple module: :
